decks.notes: This Dimir Tempo deck focuses on controlling the board while applying pressure with efficient creatures and disruption spells. The goal is to disrupt the opponent's game plan with cards like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Daze, while deploying threats like Brazen Borrower and Murktide Regent to close out the game quickly. The deck also includes card draw spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to help find the right cards at the right time. Overall, the deck aims to maintain a tempo advantage by efficiently deploying threats and disrupting the opponent's strategy.

This UWx Control deck is focused on disruption and card advantage. It utilizes powerful control spells like Force of Will, Swords to Plowshares, and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also generating card advantage with cards like Brainstorm, Ponder, and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. The deck also includes efficient threats like Brazen Borrower, Murktide Regent, and Baleful Strix to close out the game once the opponent's resources have been depleted. The mana base is designed to support the deck's two-color requirements while also providing land destruction with Wasteland.

The main concept of this deck is to play aggressively with efficient threats like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Daze and Force of Will. The deck aims to control the tempo of the game by utilizing cards like Lightning Bolt and Wasteland to keep the opponent on the back foot. By utilizing efficient card draw spells like Brainstorm and Ponder, the deck can consistently find its threats and answers to maintain pressure on the opponent. The overall strategy is to apply early pressure and disrupt the opponent's game plan to secure a win.

This deck focuses on using powerful Eldrazi creatures to quickly overwhelm the opponent. By utilizing mana acceleration cards like Lotus Petal and Grim Monolith, the deck aims to cast disruptive creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Glaring Fleshraker early in the game. Chalice of the Void and Sowing Mycospawn provide additional disruption, while cards like Eldrazi Temple and Eye of Ugin help to efficiently cast the high-cost Eldrazi spells. The deck also includes land disruption effects like Wasteland to further disrupt the opponent's game plan. Overall, the deck aims to aggressively disrupt and overpower the opponent with its Eldrazi threats.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through disruptive spells like Stifle and Force of Will, while using powerful creatures like Phyrexian Dreadnought and Murktide Regent to quickly close out the game. Wasteland is used to disrupt the opponent's mana base, while Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Curie, Emergent Intelligence provide card advantage and help to filter draws. Consign to Memory and Swords to Plowshares are used for removal, and Ponder and Brainstorm help to set up the perfect hand. Overall, this deck aims to stifle the opponent's game plan while overwhelming them with efficient threats.

The deck focuses on quickly assembling a game-winning combo by milling the entire library and playing a Thassa's Oracle to win the game on the spot. This deck utilizes cards like Dark Ritual, Lotus Petal, and Simian Spirit Guide to ramp up quickly and play numerous spells in a single turn. By utilizing Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer to mill the entire deck, the player can then play Thassa's Oracle to win the game instantly. The deck is designed to be fast and efficient in executing its combo to secure victory.
